home.description: I love the universe of web programming, design and web development, and general technology.

about.title: About
about.intro: Hello! I'm Israel Moreno, a full stack web developer based in Spain.
about.description: I'm a web developer with over 3 years of experience in the industry, specializing in Laravel (PHP) development. I've participated in various projects, including reservation management systems, OpenAI integration, and payment gateway implementations. My expertise spans PHP, HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
about.mission: My focus is on developing innovative and efficient solutions, optimizing processes, and adapting to each project's needs. I consider myself organized, motivated, and committed to teamwork and continuous improvement.

items.skills: Web development, JSON, and modern web technologies

items.school: National University of Distance Education - U.N.E.D.

responsibilities: Web Development: Creation and maintenance of scalable, high-performance platforms with Laravel (PHP).
Reservation Management: Design of intuitive systems to optimize user experience.
Advanced Integrations: Implementation of OpenAI API for customization and automation.
Payment Gateways: Secure configuration and integration for global transactions.
Interactive Frontend: Dynamic interfaces with Laravel Livewire and Vue.js.
Customer Support: Direct interaction to adapt functionalities and provide solutions.
Development and maintenance of web applications using PHP, JavaScript and MySQL.
Web layout using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap.
Handling and optimization of XML and JSON data formats.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Combining professional experience with personal projects
projects.otherProjectsDescription: More work done during my professional career

list.title: Multisite Web
list.description: Development of beon. Entertainment's main website, focused on showcasing productions and ticket sales. A modern and adaptive design was used to ensure an optimal user experience across all devices.
list.long_description: The project for beon. Entertainment consisted of a complete redesign and development of their new web platform. The goal was to create an attractive and functional portal that would serve as a showcase for their theatrical productions and events, while facilitating ticket purchases through integration with their ticketing systems. Special emphasis was placed on performance optimization and a responsive design that would adapt perfectly to mobile devices, tablets, and computers.
list.long_description_2: As a web developer at beon. Worldwide, I had the opportunity to design and build key projects. This multisite platform represents to date one of my most significant contributions, a project in which I played a central role in its conception, development, and delivery, effectively managing both the time and resources required.
list.long_description_3: The challenge of managing multiple websites with diverse content and language requirements from a single codebase was solved. Built with Laravel and Livewire, the platform offers:
details: Unified Multisite Administration: Efficient content management for multiple shows (e.g., The Pillars of the Earth, the musical, The Neverending Story, the musical...) and the main beon. Entertainment site from a single interface.

Sophisticated Multilingual System: I implemented a localization service based on the 'Strategy Pattern' for dynamic language switching, maintaining page context and supporting SEO-friendly translated URLs (e.g., /la-productora â†” /the-producer).
Dynamic Content Management: Tools to create custom pages, news, and detailed profiles for cast, staff, and creative team, all with multilingual support.

Performance Optimization: An image optimization pipeline was integrated that automatically converts images to modern formats (AVIF/WebP) with lazy loading, significantly improving website performance.
Modern and Adaptive Design: Special emphasis was placed on responsive design for a seamless user experience on mobile devices, tablets, and computers.

list.title: Web Platform
list.description: Development of the web platform for CTx, the largest tech event in Southern Europe. An immersive experience connecting technology, businesses, and talent with +50k attendees and +150 speakers.
list.long_description: CTx Tech Experience Hub is the largest tech event in Southern Europe, held in Seville. An immersive experience that connects technology, businesses, and talent, generating strategic synergies, attracting investment, and projecting new forms of innovation. As a Web Developer at beon. Worldwide, I actively participated in the development of this modern and dynamic web platform.
details: Modern and immersive design with fluid animations and striking visual effects to reflect the tech essence of the event.
Integration with Aurora, an AI virtual assistant to enhance user experience.
Integrated ticket sales platform with different access types and experiences.
Complete speaker management system with detailed profiles of +150 tech industry leaders.
Dynamic section for participating startups and companies with +1000 emerging businesses.
Performance optimization and fully responsive design for all devices.

list.title: Event Landing Page
list.description: Development of an optimized landing page for the 'Finca Alfoliz Origen' event, with an integrated system for ticket management and sales.
list.long_description: Part of my work as a Web Developer at beon. Worldwide, this project focused on creating a high-performance landing page to promote the event and efficiently manage ticket sales. The priority was resource optimization, ensuring a fast and smooth user experience, from information consultation to the final ticket purchase.
details: Design and development of a landing page focused on conversion and clarity of event information.
Direct integration with a ticketing platform for simplified and secure ticket management.
Image optimization and load times to ensure maximum performance even on mobile devices.
Payment gateway configuration to securely process ticket purchase transactions.
Administration panel for tracking sales and managing event attendees.

list.title: Retail Fair Website
list.description: Development of the web platform for ZigZag, the first retail expansion fair in the Iberian Peninsula, held at the Palacio de Convenciones in Madrid.
list.long_description: ZigZag Expo Retail is a specialized event where brands, franchises, shopping centers, real estate developers, and retail sector consultants come together to boost their growth, find new locations, and generate strategic alliances. As a Web Developer at beon. Worldwide, I participated in creating this modern and attractive web platform.
details: Development of a corporate website with modern design and fluid animations to capture visitors' attention.
Integrated ticket sales system with different access types (Premium, General) and early bird pricing.
Multilingual content management in 5 languages (Spanish, English, Italian, Portuguese, and French) to reach an international audience.
Dynamic sections to showcase exhibitors, event categories (Fashion, Food, Home, Sports, etc.) and statistics.
Integration of information about the ZigZag Party event at Teatro CalderÃ³n with featured speakers.
Performance optimization with AVIF format images and fully responsive design.
